name: Tap To Dash - Do Not Flap
name_original: Tap To Dash - Do Not Flap
description:
Tap to dash throught obstacles then collect coins, use them to unlock new characters. Choose from sparrow to helicopter, parrot to robotic bird... Good luck on your adventure!!!

Key features:

# Tap only control
# Collect coins
# Unlock new birds, aircrafts, dragons...
# Each time you unlock a Character of a new Character Set, you'll get one new FREE background bonus
# Challenge the world and your friends

Let's play Tap to Dash, on Phone or Watch
